name: MetalMania v0.3
description:
V0.4 FINAL BUILD LINK

A robotic combat game inspired by the TV shows Robot Wars, Battlebots and Robotica. Currently in development! Version 0.3

 New Features:

Gauntlet Game Mode: Get to the end in record time!

2 new playable bots, Run Amok and Tombstone! With more on the way!

Reworked weapon behaviours and physics, no more horrible clipping!

DISCLAIMER: I do not own nor am I associated with Robot Wars, Battlebots or Robotica in anyway. This is a fan made project that features some content that I do not own.
